Functions
00300_TEE_GetPropertyAsU32
GP_010_Properties

Functions

 TestCase_GC001_AllIntegers ()
 
 TestCase_BC002_NonIntegers ()
 
 TestCase_BC003_nameUnknown ()
 
 TestCase_BC004_nameNull ()
 
 TestCase_BC005_bufferNull ()
 
 TestCase_GC007_U32_boundaryStress ()
 

Detailed Description

Description:
: This test intends to verify the behavior of TA properties APIs for Getting a Property as a U32. 
           TEE_Result TEE_GetPropertyAsU32(
                               TEE_PropSetHandle propsetOrEnumerator,
               [instringopt]   char* name,
               [out]           uint32_t* value );

           For this test, we will need at least one TA.

           Enumeration is not performed in this test.

           Pre:
           Open a session to a GPTA.

           Post:
           Close session and check that it succeeds.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC001_AllIntegers ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that an integer property can be correctly retrieved. Also verify all required integer properties.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.ta.stackSize" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.ta.dataSize" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd.tee.systemTime.protectionLevel" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd.tee.TAPersistentTime.protectionLevel" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd.tee.arith.maxBigIntSize" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd.tee.trustedStorage.antiRollback.protectionLevel" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00300_TEE_GetPropertyAsU32.GC001_AllIntegers
TestCase_BC002_NonIntegers ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that attempted retrieval of incorrect properties as a U32 fails.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd.ta.appID" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd.ta.singleInstance" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd.ta.version" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd.tee.trustedos.implementation.binaryversion" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.client.identity" should return TEE_ERROR_BAD_FORMAT
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:

TestCase_BC005_bufferNull ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:

TestCase_GC007_U32_boundaryStress ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that an U32 property can be correctly retrieved and that it does not overlap on either side of the destination variable.
Test Steps:
Allocate a buffer 8x the size needed to represent the U32 used for this test for 1 to 16: fill the buffer with random data, and make a copy of it for comparison later randomly choose an offset of from 4 to size of a U32 * 2 + 4 (aligned on 4 bytes) set the output pointer to the buffer + offset For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd.ta.stackSize" should return an unsigned integer value and TEE_SUCCESS Check that all data before the output portion of the buffer did not change Check that all data after the output portion of the buffer did not change
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00300_TEE_GetPropertyAsU32.GC007_U32_boundaryStress
